author: Devjyot Ghoshal
title: Vitriol and violence: A coronavirus death exposes paranoia in India
description: When Satyaki Mitra's father developed a mild fever in mid-March, the graduate student in Philadelphia wasn't especially worried. He told his 57-year-old father, living in the eastern Indian city of Kolkata, to get tested for the new coronavirus.
content: NEW DELHI/KOLKATA (Reuters) - When Satyaki Mitra’s father developed a mild fever in mid-March, the graduate student in Philadelphia wasn’t especially worried. He told his 57-year-old father, living in the eastern Indian city of Kolkata, to get tested for the … [+7249 chars]
